title: Why providers say 'it depends'
summary: Real care depends on anatomy, history, and goals.
body: Providers avoid one-size answers because outcomes vary. Good consults personalize the plan.

title: Why answers can feel vague
summary: Time limits and safety checks shape how providers explain things.
body: Most clinics balance education with time, which is why clear questions help.

title: Questions that unlock clearer answers
summary: Ask about goals, tradeoffs, and follow-up plans.
body: Specific questions get specific answers. Focus on outcomes, timelines, and alternatives.
